channel.title: Constructor error
channel.description:
[code]src\server\Server.java:181: error: constructor ClanChatHandler in class ClanChat Handler cannot be applied to given types; public static ClanChatHandler clanChat = new ClanChatHandler(); ^ required: Client found: no arguments reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Getting this error currently. Everything is imported. My conventions are fine. Not really sure what to do. Been searching for a while and trying things out.

item.title: Constructor error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Lordabyssal, post:2, topic:545735”]This constructor has no arguments!

required: Client
found: no arguments

Needs Client argument!

public static ClanChatHandler clanChat = new ClanChatHandler(c); [/quote]
Change it to this. Chances are he’s in the Client class already.

Read full topic
